questions.text: How do you primarily deal with challenges?

options.text: I confront them head-on.
I seek support or knowledge to address them.
I try to maintain harmony and balance.

questions.text: Which motivation resonates with you the most?

options.text: Being successful and valued.
Doing the right thing and having integrity.
Exerting control and protecting myself.

questions.text: How do you approach your goals?

options.text: I adapt and do whatever it takes.
I'm driven by my passion for success.
Injustice and unfairness.
Feeling out of control.
By challenging obstacles and conflicts.
By ensuring things align with my values.

questions.text: What best describes your approach to feedback?

options.text: I use it as a ladder to climb higher.
I align it with my values and principles.
I confront it and assert my perspective.

questions.text: What do you prioritize in life?

options.text: Knowledge and competence.
Building connections and helping others.
Stability and guidance.
I research and seek understanding.
I rely on my support system.

questions.text: When someone is in need, how do you respond?

options.text: I empathize and offer help.
I provide information or a solution.
Seek guidance from trusted individuals.
Analyze the situation deeply.

questions.text: Which statement resonates more with you?

options.text: I often detach to contemplate and understand.
I often put others before myself.
I am dedicated and need to feel secure.

questions.text: How do you relate to the world?

options.text: I seek depth and individuality.
I look for excitement and experiences.
I prefer peace and easygoing environments.
I seek new experiences and distractions.
I contemplate and seek deeper understanding.
I avoid them and seek harmony.
I address them head-on.

questions.text: How do you feel about routines?

options.text: They provide comfort, but I can feel trapped.
I often break routines in search of something new.
Different from others, sometimes misunderstood.
As someone in constant pursuit of knowledge.
